note: The values for training computation are estimates and come with some uncertainty, especially for models for which only minimal information has been disclosed, such as GPT-4.
title: Artificial intelligence: Performance on knowledge tests vs. training computation
subtitle: Performance on knowledge tests is measured with the [MMLU benchmark](#dod:ai-MMLU), here with 5-shot learning, which gauges a model’s accuracy after receiving only five examples for each task. Training computation is measured in total petaFLOP, which is 10¹⁵ [floating-point operations](#dod:flop).
